mapper.select: select id_num from login_info where login_id = #{id} and login_pw = #{pw}

select c.name,ci.age,r.region_code,r.region_name,ri.region_lat,ri.region_lng from child as c join child_info as ci on c.id_num = ci.id_num join region as r on r.region_code = ci.region_code join region_info as ri on ri.region_code = r.region_code where c.id_num = #{idNum}
mapper.sql: select rt.region_lat,rt.region_lng,rt.res_name,rt.res_address,rt.res_link from region_info as ri join restaurant as rt on ri.region_code = rt.region_code
